Activity: Arrive at the office. Coffee. Check emails. I am curious about the game's narrative design.
Review feedback from @Ldes-1 on the puzzle design. Address any concerns or suggestions.
Continue refining the puzzle based on feedback. Focus on polish and clarity. Make sure the puzzle is easy to understand and that the solution is rewarding.
Focus on the overall flow and pacing of the level. Play through the level from start to finish. Identify any areas that feel slow or disjointed.
Adjust the level layout to improve the flow and pacing. Add or remove pathways, move objects, and change the timing of events.
Iterate the visual look and feel of the level. Continue adding set dressing, adjusting lighting, and experimenting with different visual effects.
Meeting with @Ndes-1. Discuss the potential integration of the level into the main campaign and the narrative implications for the level design. Subject: level integration and narrative.
Address any concerns or suggestions raised by @Ndes-1. Need to re-iterate some of the layout based on the new ideas.
Back up work and write a summary of progress. Send email to @Ldes-1 with update and ask for feedback on the overall flow and pacing of the level.
